name: landscape
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a large area of countryside, especially in relation to its appearance
trans_examp.trans_cn: 乡间，野外；（尤指乡村的）风景，景色

example.eg: The landscape is dotted with the tents of campers and hikers.
example.egtrans: 乡间散布着宿营者和远足者搭起的帐篷。

example.eg: The cathedral dominates the landscape for miles around.
example.egtrans: 大教堂在方圆数英里的乡间高高耸立着。

trans_examp.trans_en: a view or picture of the countryside, or the art of making such pictures
trans_examp.trans_cn: 乡村风景；乡村风景画；乡村风景绘画

example.eg: J.M.W. Turner is one of the best-known British landscape painters.
example.egtrans: J.M.W.特纳是英国最著名的风景画画家之一。

name: landscape
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to change the appearance of an area of land, especially next to a building or road so that it looks more like natural countryside
trans_examp.trans_cn: 给（建筑物周边）做园林美化；对（道路周边）做景观美化

name: landscape
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: A landscape document is to be printed with the longer side of the paper at the top and bottom.
